detectors.description:

detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract Calvin (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Calvin.sol#102-224) has payable functions:
	 - Calvin.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Calvin.sol#212-214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0

detectors.description:
